name: Pole Position Remake: NHSGA Edition
description:
Play a modernized 3D version of the classic racing arcade game Pole Position! Race to beat your high score in a Formula 1 race car.

Controls:

Press Enter to Start!

W - Accelerate

A, D - Turn right/left

S - Brake

Space - Shift

Credits:

Larry Ye - Producer/Artist

Tina Chen - Artist

Ryder Schmelzle - Programmer

Davis Germain - Programmer

Louis Ye - Sound Designer/Programmer

Made as a project for NHSGA (hence the NHSGA/CMU Pre-College theming)
